main.name: Hello, I'm Albert!
main.description: Aspiring to work on software engineering projects - with a lot of MATH!
main.bio1: I love programming, I love math, I love physics <3 I just love problem-solving in general, especially if it involves a lot of coding!
main.bio2: Aside from that, I am an extra-outgoing guy who loves conversations and anything public speaking.
main.bio3: Also, to keep myself sane (from all the coding), I love to gym and watch anime (Warning: I am a JoJo fan).
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: B. Comp in Computer Science and Mathematics
education.description2: Recipient of NUS Undergraduate Merit Scholarship (ASEAN)
Recipient of Raffles Institution School-Based Full Scholarship (ASEAN)

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: My internship at ConcreteAI was a blast! I learned a wide variety of technical software engineering skills: low-level development in C++, mobile application development using Kotlin (Andriod studio) and time series classfication with PyTorch MLP models. My main takeaways are: reading documentation skills (Actually! This helps me pick new concepts much faster with regards to new libraries or frameworks) and writing code responsibly -  and readable code :)

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: I teach CS1010E Introduction to Programming in Python to a class of 25 freshmen. I learned how to explain programming concepts in an easy-to-understand way for those without programming background. This helped me enhance my communication ability to non-IT personnels and deepen my understanding of programming concepts.

skills.name: Programming Language
skills.description: C, C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, Kotlin

skills.name: Framework and Tools
skills.description: React, Kotlin (Android Studio), NodeJS, ExpressJS, Firebase, MongoDB, Git
